item.title: Biography
item.description: Christopher Tranquille Christopher Tranquille is a 23 year-old student current reading for a Masters in Financial Analysis at London Business School. The following biography will include a brief history on his early life (1996 - 2016) and professional life (2016 onwards). Early life Christopher Tranquille grew up in a small town in the Netherlands called Lisse, well known for its flowers gardens “Het Keukenhof”. Christopher always had a strong affinity for physics, mathematics and engineering and he had a passion for music.

item.title: Climate change and temperature anomalies
item.description: Climate change and temperature anomalies We are going to study climate change and temperature anomalies. We get data of Combined Land-Surface Air and Sea-Surface Water Temperature Anomalies in the Northern Hemisphere at NASA’s Goddard Institute for Space Studies, and the tabular data of temperature anomalies Data initialization and manipulation weather <- read_csv("https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v3/NH.Ts+dSST.csv", skip = 1, na = "***") Notice that, when using this function, we added two options: skip and na.

item.title: Yield Curve inversion
item.description: Yield Curve inversion Every so often, we hear warnings from commentators on the “inverted yield curve” and its predictive power with respect to recessions. An explainer what a inverted yield curve is can be found here. If you’d rather listen to something, here is a great podcast from NPR on yield curve indicators In addition, many articles and commentators think that, e.g., Yield curve inversion is viewed as a harbinger of recession.

item.title: Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance
item.description: Every two years, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention conduct the Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System (YRBSS) survey, where it takes data from high schoolers (9th through 12th grade), to analyze health patterns. We will work with a selected group of variables from a random sample of observations during one of the years the YRBSS was conducted. Load the data This data is part of the openintro textbook and we can load and inspect it.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
